name: DaMonkey
description:
Firstly: I really enjoyed participating in this Jam!  It is the first game Jam I have ever participated in and has been a beautiful (although a bit stressful) learning experience. 

Summary: Slap Chop Chop up the forest, jungle, and castle so that he may rescue his love, Cha Cha.

A Quick Note: The state machine for this game was very hacked together, so there are a few softlocks still in the game that I am aware of.  I will probably revisit and add more softlock prevention after the jam.  Still, I think that they occur few and far between, and hope you will be able to enjoy the game regardless!
